Words is a dictionary concept designed to be an ergonomic, one-handable experience. In addition to being a great tool to improve your vocabulary, Words experiments with user experience and tries to solve modern problems on growing devices such as navigation, reachability and visual balance. \n\nThe idea for Words came when reading in bed, with a book in one hand and a phone in the other, trying to stretch a thumb to a far away search bar.
